solution_line_template: Michael cleans himself {total_cleans_per_week} times a week because {bath_per_week} + {shower_per_week} = <<{bath_per_week}+{shower_per_week}={total_cleans_per_week}>>{total_cleans_per_week}

He cleans himself {total_cleans_in_52_weeks} times {num_weeks} weeks because {num_weeks} x {total_cleans_per_week} = <<{total_cleans_in_52_weeks}={total_cleans_in_52_weeks}>>{total_cleans_in_52_weeks}
